claims.claim: Intratumoral mRNA vaccination triggers local innate sensing and type I interferon signaling.

evidence.quote: Intratumoral mRNA vaccination triggers local innate sensing and type I interferon signaling.
Type I interferon response score (normalized units) | 3.1 | 1.0

claims.caveat: Some mechanistic readouts were strongest in specific model systems rather than uniformly across all tested settings.

claims.claim: Interferon-associated antigen processing and presentation pathways increase following vaccination.

evidence.quote: Interferon-associated antigen processing and presentation pathways increase.
Fraction of proteins represented in MHC-I peptidome | 40.6% | 20.6%

claims.caveat: Some mechanistic readouts were strongest in specific model systems rather than uniformly across all tested settings.

claims.claim: Combined intervention improves tumor control in mouse models.

evidence.quote: Combined intervention improves tumor control in mice

claims.caveat: Mouse model effects may not map one-to-one to all human tumors.

claims.claim: Prior SARS-CoV-2 mRNA vaccination is associated with better outcomes in retrospective human cohorts.

evidence.quote: Vaccinated subgroup had improved survival under ICI treatment
aligns with better outcomes in the retrospective human cohort

claims.caveat: The human analysis is retrospective and non-randomized; residual confounding is likely.
